publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2051 Iain Smith: Congratulations to Scotland Cricket Team—That the Parliament congratulates the Scotland cricket team on winning the ICC Intercontinental Cup; believes that this is an important landmark in the development of Scottish cricket, and wishes Cricket Scotland and the Scotland team continued success, particularly in next year’s qualification for the Cricket World Cup. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*

S2M-2051 Congratulations to Scotland Cricket Team (lodged on 23 November 2004) David Mundell*, Phil Gallie*, Murray Tosh*, Colin Fox*, Bruce Crawford*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Fiona Hyslop*, Michael McMahon*, Christine May*, David McLetchie*, Scott Barrie*, Robin Harper*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Murdo Fraser*, Margaret Smith*, Brian Adam*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Mike Pringle*, John Scott*

S2M-2051 Congratulations to Scotland Cricket Team (lodged on 23 November 2004) Alex Johnstone*, Alex Fergusson*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Dr Jean Turner*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Frances Curran*

S2M-2051 Iain Smith: Congratulations to Scotland Cricket Team—That the Parliament congratulates the Scotland cricket team on winning the ICC Intercontinental Cup; believes that this is an important landmark in the development of Scottish cricket, and wishes Cricket Scotland and the Scotland team continued success, particularly in next year’s qualification for the Cricket World Cup. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, David Mundell, Phil Gallie, Murray Tosh, Colin Fox, Bruce Crawford, Dr Elaine Murray, Fiona Hyslop, Michael McMahon, Christine May, David McLetchie, Scott Barrie, Robin Harper, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Murdo Fraser, Margaret Smith, Brian Adam, Michael Matheson, Mr Frank McAveety, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Nora Radcliffe, Mr David Davidson, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Mike Pringle, John Scott, Alex Johnstone, Alex Fergusson, Roseanna Cunningham, Mary Scanlon, Mr Brian Monteith, Dr Jean Turner, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Frances Curran, Bill Aitken*, Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-2051 Congratulations to Scotland Cricket Team (lodged on 23 November 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*, Miss Annabel Goldie*, Trish Godman*
S2M-2051 Congratulations to Scotland Cricket Team (lodged on 23 November 2004) Maureen Macmillan*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-2051 Congratulations to Scotland Cricket Team (lodged on 23 November 2004) Chris Ballance*
